data.author: Tom Goodenough

changelog.release_notes:
In this version, the date is changed from mm/dd to abbreviated date and day number, e.g. 'Apr 9'.
This is a quick fix for the issue of not being able to choose American/European date. Whilst I set up a settings page for that, this fix will solve that issue in part, at least for the time being.

The 12 hour clock now displays correctly; the 'AM' or 'PM' does not 'spill over' into the next third of the screen any more because the font size is decreased.

data.description:
Clean Modern: The Black Version.
White version also available: http://pblweb.com/appstore/534595aabd0eb8c891000296/

A simple, modern watchface displaying three sections: the date, the time and the day of the week.

12 hour time has a smaller and different font - will be fixed in next update.

A settings page to choose American/European date format will also be added in the next update.

latest_release.release_notes:
In this version, the date is changed from mm/dd to abbreviated date and day number, e.g. 'Apr 9'.
This is a quick fix for the issue of not being able to choose American/European date. Whilst I set up a settings page for that, this fix will solve that issue in part, at least for the time being.

The 12 hour clock now displays correctly; the 'AM' or 'PM' does not 'spill over' into the next third of the screen any more because the font size is decreased.

data.title: Clean Modern Black
